about_the_game:
Return to an old game project that you once abandoned, only the game hasn’t stopped changing since you left it. The game has begun to evolve, NPCs have slowly started to abandon their intended roles, new bugs have emerged, and the morality of this world is becoming questionable. As the creator of this world it is up to you to determine the direction of the game. Will you attempt to restore the game to its intended state, or has this world deviated too far from sanity to be saved?

Key Features

  • Gather resources and work with NPCs to upgrade the town. The community evolves as you and the NPCs collaborate.

  • Make friends (or enemies) with the local NPCs! Some of them are glad you’re back, others not so much…

  • Upgrade your developer skills to access the game’s source code, granting you the power to alter game rules, manipulate item stats, and even teleport!

  • Unlock the secrets of the game and the NPCs within it.

content_descriptors.notes: ThisIsTheGame blurs the line between player and developer, allowing you to cause NPCs to exhibit tendencies that might be perceived as negative or harmful. Players may find themselves pondering the consequences of their actions long after they've logged off. As such, it is recommended for mature players who are comfortable navigating gray areas of morality.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
